sentence: Then-Rep. Ron DeSantis was not the legacy-favored GOP pick before Trump endorsed him.
author: Brent D. Griffiths
title: Trump endorses 'Never Trump guy' JD Vance, ignoring many Ohio Republicans who wanted him to pick a different candidate in a key Senate race
